Burkitt and Burkitt-like lymphoma/leukemia
							                    Treatment options for newly diagnosed Burkitt and Burkitt-like lymphoma/leukemia    Treatment options for newly diagnosed Burkitt and Burkitt-like lymphoma /leukemia may include:            -  Surgery to remove as much of the tumor as possible, followed by combination chemotherapy.     - Combination chemotherapy.     - Combination chemotherapy and targeted therapy (rituximab).
